title: Translated Japanese SNES roms Part 3
description:
This is my third collection of Japanese SNES roms that have been translated into English. I have done all the necessary patching, so there is no fooling with IPS or UPS files required. I made this because many people have problems figuring out how to patch their roms. Included with the roms are two emulators that I use, ZSNES (the one that I mainly use, because it has extremely low system requirements,) and SNES9x (which plays some games more accurately than ZSNES.) There are two versions of SNES9x included, the Windows 32 bit version for XP and up, and the Windows 9x version for Windows ME and Windows 98. I downloaded the patches for these games from [urlhttp://www.romhacking.net[/url]. You can find a few more translated games on that site that I did not include here. Per a private message request I have included all of the other Gundam games that were not present in my previous two torrents. I was also asked about any other Super Robot Wars translations and looked around, but could not find any other games for the SNES that were completed. There is a SRW for the PSX that has been translated, but this is a SNES rom torrent. SRW 4 and SRW EX are close, but I am holding off on a torrent release of them until more work is done.

The roms included are:

Ball Bullet Gun.smc
Cyborg 009.smc
Dossun! - Stone Battle.smc
Dream Maze - The Kigurumi Adventure.smc
Gundam Wing - Endless Duel.smc
Gunman's Proof.smc
Holy Umbrella - Dondera's Wild.smc
Kunio Kun Dodgeball.smc
Madou Monogatari - Big Kindergarten Kids.smc
Mickey and Donald - Magical Adventure 3.smc
Mobile Fighter G Gundam.smc
Mysterious Dungeon 2 - Shiren the Wanderer.smc
Pretty Soldier Sailor Moon - Another Story.smc
River City Ransom 2.smc
Sanrio World Smash Ball.smc
Slayers.SMC
Snoopy Concert.smc
Star Fox 2.smc
Tactics Ogre - Let Us Cling Together.smc
Umihara Kawase.smc
V Gundam.smc
